properties.entry: SELECT PRODUCT_NO, PRODUCT_NAME, CELEB_NAME, PRODUCT_PRICE, FILE_PATH || ORIGIN_NAME "TITLEIMG" FROM PRODUCT JOIN P_ATTACHMENT ON (PRODUCT_NO = REF_PNO) WHERE PRODUCT_STATUS='Y' AND FILE_LEVEL=1 ORDER BY PRODUCT_ENROLLDATE DESC

SELECT PRODUCT_NO, PRODUCT_NAME, CELEB_NAME, PRODUCT_STOCK, PRODUCT_CONTENT, PRODUCT_PRICE, PRODUCT_COMMENT, FILE_PATH || ORIGIN_NAME "TITLEIMG" FROM PRODUCT JOIN P_ATTACHMENT ON (PRODUCT_NO = REF_PNO) WHERE PRODUCT_NO=? AND FILE_LEVEL=1 AND PRODUCT_STATUS='Y'
SELECT FILE_NO, ORIGIN_NAME, FILE_PATH FROM P_ATTACHMENT WHERE REF_PNO=? AND FILE_LEVEL=2

SELECT PRODUCT_NO, PRODUCT_CATEGORY_NAME, PRODUCT_NAME, CELEB_NAME, PRODUCT_STOCK, PRODUCT_CONTENT, PRODUCT_PRICE, PRODUCT_COMMENT, FILE_PATH || ORIGIN_NAME "TITLEIMG", PRODUCT_STATUS FROM PRODUCT JOIN P_CATEGORY USING(PRODUCT_CATEGORY_NO) JOIN P_ATTACHMENT ON (PRODUCT_NO = REF_PNO) WHERE FILE_LEVEL=1 ORDER BY PRODUCT_ENROLLDATE DESC
SELECT PRODUCT_CATEGORY_NO, PRODUCT_CATEGORY_NAME FROM P_CATEGORY
INSERT INTO PRODUCT(PRODUCT_NO, CELEB_NAME, PRODUCT_CATEGORY_NO, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_PRICE, PRODUCT_STOCK, PRODUCT_COMMENT, PRODUCT_CONTENT) VALUES(SEQ_PNO.NEXTVAL,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
INSERT INTO P_ATTACHMENT(FILE_NO, REF_PNO, ORIGIN_NAME, FILE_PATH, FILE_LEVEL) VALUES(SEQ_PFNO.NEXTVAL,SEQ_PNO.CURRVAL,?,?,?)

SELECT PRODUCT_NO, PRODUCT_CATEGORY_NAME, PRODUCT_NAME, CELEB_NAME, PRODUCT_STOCK, PRODUCT_CONTENT, PRODUCT_PRICE, PRODUCT_COMMENT, PRODUCT_ENROLLDATE, PRODUCT_STATUS, FILE_NO, FILE_PATH, ORIGIN_NAME FROM PRODUCT JOIN P_ATTACHMENT ON (PRODUCT_NO = REF_PNO) JOIN P_CATEGORY USING(PRODUCT_CATEGORY_NO) WHERE PRODUCT_NO=? AND FILE_LEVEL=1
SELECT FILE_NO, ORIGIN_NAME, FILE_PATH FROM P_ATTACHMENT WHERE REF_PNO=? AND FILE_LEVEL=2
UPDATE PRODUCT SET CELEB_NAME=?, PRODUCT_CATEGORY_NO=?, PRODUCT_NAME=?, PRODUCT_PRICE=?, PRODUCT_STOCK=?, PRODUCT_COMMENT=?, PRODUCT_CONTENT=? WHERE PRODUCT_NO=? AND PRODUCT_STATUS='Y'
UPDATE P_ATTACHMENT SET ORIGIN_NAME=?, FILE_PATH=? WHERE FILE_NO=?
UPDATE P_ATTACHMENT SET ORIGIN_NAME=?, FILE_PATH=? WHERE FILE_NO=?
INSERT INTO P_ATTACHMENT(FILE_NO, REF_PNO, ORIGIN_NAME, FILE_PATH, FILE_LEVEL) VALUES(SEQ_PFNO.NEXTVAL,?,?,?,2)
UPDATE P_ATTACHMENT SET ORIGIN_NAME=?, FILE_PATH=? WHERE FILE_NO=?
INSERT INTO P_ATTACHMENT(FILE_NO, REF_PNO, ORIGIN_NAME, FILE_PATH, FILE_LEVEL) VALUES(SEQ_PFNO.NEXTVAL,?,?,?,2)
UPDATE PRODUCT SET PRODUCT_STATUS='N' WHERE PRODUCT_NO=?

SELECT USER_NAME, REVIEW_CONTENT, REVIEW_SCORE, CREATE_DATE FROM REVIEW JOIN MEMBER USING(USER_NO) WHERE REF_PNO=? AND REVIEW_STATUS='Y' ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC
